divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my dad went to the whisky cafe in North Arlington (NJ) to see if they still had there car shows.They said yes.SO as we leave to go to the car we here a faint whistle like sound,we didnt care about it until we went in the car,leeft the parking lot and saw what was causing that noise from the south west.It was a dark oval objectmoving up and down left to right and hovering.There was smoke coming out the back of it,like it was going to crash it started moveing down then suddenly vanished behind the clouds.this all happened in a..quick quick 35 seconds!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in North Arlington
There were no other sightings in North Arlington on or around June 29th 2007
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
